snippet: The West Harlem Local Development Corporation’s first grant cycle, for this, the first year, will distribute $2 million to neighborhood nonprofit groups in March.
abstract: The West Harlem Local Development Corporation’s first grant cycle, for this first year, will distribute $2 million to neighborhood nonprofit groups in March; group was formed some eight years ago to negotiate on community's behalf with Columbia University; benefits agreement requires Columbia to give corporation $76 million to address neighborhood's needs.
lead_paragraph: The West Harlem Local Development Corporation’s first grant cycle, for this, the first year, will distribute $2 million to neighborhood nonprofit groups in March.

headline.seo: An Evolving West Harlem Is Portrayed in Grant Requests
headline.main: An Evolving West Harlem, Portrayed in a First Wave of Grant Requests
headline.print_headline: An Evolving West Harlem, Portrayed in a First Wave of Grant Requests
